MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH46 postcode area of West Linton. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6pm to clear trees on our overhead line network in Harestanes and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:21PM on Wednesday 27 January 2021.
